rows: How large the text is. For this example, set it to 22.
For this example, set it to "#ffffff."
The amount of empty space between the column border and image. For this example, clickMore optionsand set padding toTop- "20,"Right- "0,"Bottom- "0,"Left- "0."
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Font size

How large the text is. For this example, set it to 22.

Text color

For this example, set it to "#ffffff."

Padding

The amount of empty space between the column border and image. For this example, click More options and set padding to Top - "20," Right - "0," Bottom - "0," Left - "0."
